TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpClient extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 为 TCP 网络服务提供客户端连接。

span.span: Provides client connections for TCP network services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了简单方法来连接、 发送，并接收中同步阻止模式下通过网络流式传输数据。The class provides simple methods for connecting, sending, and receiving stream data over a network in synchronous blocking mode. 为了使连接和交换数据，或使用 TCP 创建必须侦听传入连接请求。In order for to connect and exchange data, a or created with the TCP must be listening for incoming connection requests. 可以在以下两种方式之一连接到此侦听器：You can connect to this listener in one of the following two ways: - 创建并调用其中一个可用的三个方法。Create a and call one of the three available methods. - 创建使用主机名和端口号的远程主机。Create a using the host name and port number of the remote host. 此构造函数将自动尝试进行连接。This constructor will automatically attempt a connection. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要将无连接的数据报发送在同步阻塞模式下，使用类。If you want to send connectionless datagrams in synchronous blocking mode, use the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例建立连接。The following code example establishes a connection. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/CPP/tcpclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/CS/tcpclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/VB/tcpclient.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新和允许基础服务提供程序分配的最合适的本地 IP 地址和端口号。This constructor creates a new and allows the underlying service provider to assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number. 必须首先调用方法，然后再发送和接收数据。You must first call the method before sending and receiving data. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数仅适用于 IPv4 地址类型。This constructor works only with IPv4 address types. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用默认构造函数创建一个新。The following code example demonstrates how to use the default constructor to create a new . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新并将其绑定到指定的`localEP`参数。This constructor creates a new and binds it to the specified by the `localEP` parameter. 调用此构造函数之前，必须创建使用想要发送和接收数据的 IP 地址和端口号。Before you call this constructor, you must create an using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data. 不需要连接和通信之前指定本地 IP 地址和端口号。You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number before connecting and communicating. 如果您创建使用其他任何构造函数，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地 IP 地址和端口号。If you create a using any other constructor, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number. 必须调用方法，然后再发送和接收数据。You must call the method before sending and receiving data. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例类使用的本地终结点。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class using a local endpoint. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新和程序同步连接尝试提供的主机名和端口号。This constructor creates a new and makes a synchronous connection attempt to the provided host name and port number. 基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地 IP 地址和端口号。The underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number. 将阻止，直到连接成功或失败。 will block until it either connects or fails. 此构造函数允许您以初始化、 解析的 DNS 主机名，并在一个方便访问的步骤中连接。This constructor allows you to initialize, resolve the DNS host name, and connect in one convenient step. 如果启用了 IPv6 和调用方法来连接到的主机，解析为 IPv6 和 IPv4 地址、 IPv6 地址将与连接尝试之前的 IPv4 地址的第一个。If IPv6 is enabled and the method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address. 这可能会延迟的时间来建立连接，如果主机未侦听 IPv6 地址。This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用若要获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，可以参考[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)有关错误的详细说明的文档。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例类使用主机名和端口号。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class using a host name and port number. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自可以使用此属性以确定是否已成功的连接尝试。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if a connection attempt has succeeded. 它不会监视连接的当前状态的。It does not monitor the ongoing connection state of . 如果远程主机关闭的连接，将不会更新。If the remote host closes the connection, will not be updated. 如果派生自，并且需要连接状态，请使用更密切地关注的属性返回的方法。If you are deriving from and require closer attention to the connection state, use the property of the returned by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种方法来确定是否将数据排队以进行读取。 is a way to determine whether data is queued for reading. 如果数据不可用，则调用来获取的数据。If data is available, call to get the data. 可用的数据是在读取的网络缓冲区中对排队的总数据量。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果无数据排队网络缓冲区中返回 0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果远程主机关闭，或关闭的连接可能会引发。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, may throw a . 如果你收到，使用若要获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，可以参考位于 MSDN library 中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library) for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example shows the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到操作完成。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要阻止在操作完成之前，请使用其中一个方法重载。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接到远程主机。The following code example creates a and connects to a remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会标记为已释放的实例，并将请求关联关闭 TCP 连接。The method marks the instance as disposed and requests that the associated close the TCP connection. 基于属性，TCP 连接可能会保持打开状态一段时间后仍然要发送数据时，调用方法。Based on the property, the TCP connection may stay open for some time after the method is called when data remains to be sent. 提供基础连接完成后关闭通知中不存在。There is no notification provided when the underlying connection has completed closing. 调用此方法最终将导致关闭关联并且还将关闭关联用于发送和接收数据，如果已经创建了一个。Calling this method will eventually result in the close of the associated and will also close the associated that is used to send and receive data if one was created. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了右通过调用方法。The following code example demonstrates closing a by calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以建立同步远程主机连接到指定的主机名和端口号。Call this method to establish a synchronous remote host connection to the specified host name and port number. 方法会阻塞，直到连接成功或失败。The method will block until it either connects or fails. 以远程主机连接后，使用方法来获取基础。After connecting with the remote host, use the method to obtain the underlying . 使用此发送和接收数据。Use this to send and receive data. 如果启用了 IPv6 和调用方法来连接到的主机，解析为 IPv6 和 IPv4 地址、 IPv6 地址将与连接尝试之前的 IPv4 地址的第一个。If IPv6 is enabled and the method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address. 这可能会延迟的时间来建立连接，如果主机未侦听 IPv6 地址。This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用若要获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，可以参考[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)有关错误的详细说明的文档。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用主机名和端口号连接与远程主机。The following code example uses the host name and port number to connect with a remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回的返回建立 TCP 连接后，将完成对象。The returned Returns object will complete after the TCP connection has been established. 连接请求时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the connection request is underway. 调用此方法以建立同步远程主机连接到指定的主机名和端口号作为异步操作。Call this method to establish a synchronous remote host connection to the specified host name and port number as an asynchronous operation. 以远程主机连接后，使用方法来获取基础。After connecting with the remote host, use the method to obtain the underlying . 使用此发送和接收数据。Use this to send and receive data. 如果启用了 IPv6 和调用方法来连接到的主机，解析为 IPv6 和 IPv4 地址、 IPv6 地址将与连接尝试之前的 IPv4 地址的第一个。If IPv6 is enabled and the method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address. 这可能会延迟的时间来建立连接，如果主机未侦听 IPv6 地址。This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用若要获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，可以参考[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)有关错误的详细说明的文档。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: if the socket was connected to a remote resource as of the most recent operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取的连接状态截止到最后一个 I/O 操作的套接字。The property gets the connection state of the socket as of the last I/O operation. 如果该属性返回`false`，则套接字要么从未连接，或已断开连接。When it returns `false`, the socket was either never connected, or is no longer connected. 因为属性仅反映最新操作时的连接的状态，则应尝试发送或接收消息，以确定当前状态。Because the property only reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation, you should attempt to send or receive a message to determine the current state. 消息发送失败后，此属性不会再返回`true`。After the message send fails, this property no longer returns `true`. 请注意，此行为是有意设计。Note that this behavior is by design. 因为，在测试和发送/接收之间的时间，连接可能已丢失，无法可靠地测试连接的状态。You cannot reliably test the state of the connection because, in the time between the test and a send/receive, the connection could have been lost. 套接字连接，并妥善处理失败传输，应假定您的代码。Your code should assume the socket is connected, and gracefully handle failed transmissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，并接着验证连接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 类的终结器关闭 TCP 连接并释放关联的所有托管的资源。The class finalizer closes the TCP connection and releases all managed resources associated with the . 这些资源包括基础用来与远程主机连接和用于发送和接收数据。These resources include the underlying used for connecting with the remote host, and the used to send and receive data. 终结器不会释放任何非托管的资源。The finalizer does not release any unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回可用于发送和接收数据。 returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 类继承自类，该类提供一系列丰富的方法和属性用于促进网络通信。The class inherits from the class, which provides a rich collection of methods and properties used to facilitate network communications. 必须调用方法第一个，或方法将引发。You must call the method first, or the method will throw an . 获取后，调用方法将数据发送到远程主机。After you have obtained the , call the method to send data to the remote host. 调用方法来接收来自远程主机的数据。Call the method to receive data arriving from the remote host. 这两种方法阻止，直到执行指定的操作。Both of these methods block until the specified operation is performed. 您可以避免在读取操作上阻止通过检查属性。You can avoid blocking on a read operation by checking the property. 一个`true`值表示数据已从远程主机到达，并可供读取。A `true` value means that data has arrived from the remote host and is available for reading. 在这种情况下，保证立即完成。In this case, is guaranteed to complete immediately. 如果远程主机已关闭连接，将立即返回包含零字节。If the remote host has shutdown its connection, will immediately return with zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 您必须关闭如果要通过发送和接收数据。You must close the when you are through sending and receiving data. 关闭不会释放。Closing does not release the . > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用若要获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，可以参考[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)有关错误的详细说明的文档。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以获取基础。The following code example uses to obtain the underlying . 获取后，它将发送和接收使用其和方法。After obtaining the , it sends and receives using its and methods. By default, lingering is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性更改的方式方法的行为。The property changes the way method behaves. 当集修改的条件下的连接可以重置通过 Winsock 时此属性。This property when set modifies the conditions under which the connection can be reset by Winsock. 连接重置仍会发生基于 IP 协议行为。Connection resets can still occur based on the IP protocol behavior. 此属性控制的 TCP 连接是在调用后仍保持打开的时间长度仍然要发送数据时。This property controls the length of time that the TCP connection will remain open after a call to when data remains to be sent. 当您调用方法中，数据放置在传出的网络缓冲区。When you call the method, data is placed in the outgoing network buffer. 此属性可以用于确保此数据发送到远程主机之前方法用于删除连接。This property can be used to ensure that this data is sent to the remote host before the method drops the connection. 若要启用延迟，创建实例包含所需的值，并设置指向此实例的属性。To enable lingering, create a instance containing the desired values, and set the property to this instance. 下表描述的行为的可能值的方法属性和属性存储在属性。The following table describes the behavior of the method for the possible values of the property and the property stored in the property. |LingerState.EnabledLingerState.Enabled|LingerState.LingerTimeLingerState.LingerTime|行为Behavior| |-------------------------|----------------------------|--------------| |`false` （禁用），默认值`false` (disabled), the default value|不适用，超时值 （默认值）。The time-out is not applicable, (default).|尝试发送挂起的数据，直到默认 IP 协议超时时间已到。Attempts to send pending data until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` （已启用）`true` (enabled)|非零值超时A nonzero time-out|尝试发送挂起的数据，直到指定的超时时间已到，如果该尝试失败，然后 Winsock 重置连接。Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` （已启用）`true` (enabled)|零个超时时间。A zero timeout.|将放弃所有挂起的数据和 Winsock 重置连接。Discards any pending data and Winsock resets the connection.| IP 堆栈计算默认 IP 协议的超时期限为使用基于连接的往返行程时间。The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection. 在大多数情况下，计算堆栈的超时值是个应用程序定义的更多相关。In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application. 这是一个套接字的默认行为时未设置属性。This is the default behavior for a socket when the property is not set. 当属性存储在属性设置为大于默认 IP 协议超时时间，则默认 IP 协议超时时间仍将应用，并替代。When the property stored in the property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置并获取套接字逗留时间。The following code example sets and gets the sockets linger time. [!code-cpp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#12)] [!code-vb[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`false`、不通过网络发送数据包，直到它收集大量的传出数据。When is `false`, a does not send a packet over the network until it has collected a significant amount of outgoing data. TCP 段中消耗的资源量，由于发送较少的数据会降低效率。Because of the amount of overhead in a TCP segment, sending small amounts of data is inefficient. 但是，情况确实存在需要发送的数据量很少或期望从每个数据包发送即时响应。However, situations do exist where you need to send very small amounts of data or expect immediate responses from each packet you send. 你的决策应权衡网络效率与应用程序要求的相对重要性。Your decision should weigh the relative importance of network efficiency versus application requirements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例禁用延迟。The following code example disables the delay. 然后，它检查的值以验证是否已成功设置该属性。It then checks the value of to verify that the property was successfully set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置应为每个读取操作的接收缓冲区中存储的字节数。The property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to store in the receive buffer for each read operation. 此属性的实际操作对象为接收传入的数据分配的网络缓冲区空间。This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for receiving incoming data. 你的网络缓冲区应至少与应用程序缓冲区以确保在调用时，将导致所需的数据可用一样大方法。Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be available when you call the method. 使用属性来设置此大小。Use the property to set this size. 如果你的应用程序将接收大容量数据，则应传递方法非常大的应用程序缓冲区。If your application will be receiving bulk data, you should pass the method a very large application buffer. 你是否比的数据量较小的网络缓冲区中请求方法，您将无法再检索所需的一个读取操作中的数据量。If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you request in the method, you will not be able to retrieve the desired amount of data in one read operation. 这可能会产生的额外调用的开销方法。This incurs the overhead of additional calls to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置并获取接收缓冲区的大小。The following code example sets and gets the receive buffer size. [!code-cpp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定时间量的方法将阻止，直至可以接收数据。The property determines the amount of time that the method will block until it is able to receive data. 此时间以毫秒为单位。This time is measured in milliseconds. 如果超时到期之前成功完成，请引发。If the time-out expires before successfully completes, throws a . 默认情况下没有任何超时。There is no time-out by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置并获取接收超时时间。The following code example sets and gets the receive time out. value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the send buffer, in bytes.
The default value is 8192 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置应为在每次调用中发送的字节数方法。The property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to send in each call to the method. 此属性的实际操作对象为发送操作分配的网络缓冲区空间。This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for send operation. 网络缓冲区应至少与应用程序缓冲区以确保所需的数据将存储并在一个操作中发送一样大。Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be stored and sent in one operation. 使用属性来设置此大小。Use the property to set this size. 如果你的应用程序将发送大容量数据，则应传递方法非常大的应用程序缓冲区。If your application will be sending bulk data, you should pass the method a very large application buffer. 如果网络缓冲区小于数据量则提供方法中，多个网络的发送操作将为您对每个调用执行方法。If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you provide the method, several network send operations will be performed for every call you make to the method. 通过确保你的网络缓冲区至少与应用程序缓冲区一样大，可以获得更大的数据吞吐量。You can achieve greater data throughput by ensuring that your network buffer is at least as large as your application buffer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置并获取发送缓冲区大小。The following code example sets and gets the send buffer size.
